LanguageData.GI_GiantClub.label: Giant Club
LanguageData.GI_GiantClub.description: This blunt weapon is literally an uprooted tree, with branches removed for a better grip. It isn't exactly pretty.
LanguageData.GI_GiantClub.tools.0.label: Head
LanguageData.GI_GiantClub.tools.1.label: Handle
LanguageData.GI_IvoryClub.label: Tusk Club
LanguageData.GI_IvoryClub.description: A weapon used by Giants. It is a tree with tusks crudely attached. Unlike its appearance, it is a very effective.
LanguageData.GI_IvoryClub.tools.0.label: Handle
LanguageData.GI_IvoryClub.tools.1.label: Tusk tip
LanguageData.GI_MammothHammer.label: Mammoth Hammer
LanguageData.GI_MammothHammer.description: A powerful blunt weapon with additional mass of enormous proboscidean skull.
LanguageData.GI_MammothHammer.tools.0.label: Handle
LanguageData.GI_MammothHammer.tools.1.label: Tusk tip
LanguageData.GI_ThrumboSpineBlade.label: Thrumbo Spineblade
LanguageData.GI_ThrumboSpineBlade.description: Ag reat thrumbo spine with metal casted on it for reinforcements. Sharpened horn is chained firmly on the top, making it a mighty tool of war.
LanguageData.GI_ThrumboSpineBlade.tools.0.label: Spine
LanguageData.GI_ThrumboSpineBlade.tools.1.label: Blade
LanguageData.GI_ThrumboSpineBlade.tools.2.label: Tip
LanguageData.GI_Cleaver.label: Giant Cleaver
LanguageData.GI_Cleaver.description: A cleaver fitted for Giants. It is forged with tiny people's technique, by grinding three heavy metal plates.
LanguageData.GI_Cleaver.tools.0.label: Handle
LanguageData.GI_Cleaver.tools.1.label: Blade
LanguageData.GI_Cleaver.tools.2.label: Tip
LanguageData.GI_Hammer.label: Giant Hammer
LanguageData.GI_Hammer.description: A hammer of Giants forged with tiny people's technique. It is made with massive amount of metal.
LanguageData.GI_Hammer.tools.0.label: Hammer head
LanguageData.GI_Hammer.tools.1.label: Handle
LanguageData.GI_Ram.label: Giant Ram
LanguageData.GI_Ram.description: An battering ram, which would be considered a oversized siege weapon for mankind. The head is shaped after mammoth skull, and war painted to terrify those who face it. Its massive case provides extra protection.
LanguageData.GI_Ram.tools.0.label: Body
LanguageData.GI_Ram.tools.1.label: Ramming head
